view

Class PlayerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ElementView
      • view.PlayerView

  • public class PlayerView
extends ElementView
    Sub-specification for ElementView meant to represent the player. Uses all functions made by its parent class but uses an image of the player as a graphical representation.

    There is only a single player so this class applies a singleton design pattern.

    Author:
    Teiki Pepin

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PlayerView getInstance()
        Gets the current instance of the PlayerView.
        Returns:
        the instance of the PlayerView.

      • getImageFile

        protected java.io.File getImageFile()
        Returns a File object that points to an image file representing a player. The File is meant to be used elsewhere in order to generate a proper sprite that can be printed on the screen.

        If the file doesn't exist, an empty File will be returned.

        Specified by:
        getImageFile in class ElementView
        Returns:
        a File object that contains an image of a player
        See Also:
        ElementView, File
